page.title: 10Foods in our area
page.content: Grown in gardens: spinach, peas, carrots, runnerbeans, broadbeans, plums, apples,damsons, corrgettes, leeks, potatoes, onions, radishes, lettuces, cabbage, cauliflowers,kale,broccoli,red currants,celery, black currants, rasberries, gooseberries, rhibarb, strawberries, sprouts, Frenchbeans,pears,loganberries, tomatoes, marrows, white currants, parsly, chives, corn on the cob, From farm: eggs, raw unpasterised milk,cream,turkeys, lamb, pork, duck, From river: trout, salmon, eels. Game: rabbit, other: honey,wild blackberries. Home produce: bread,wholemeal or white,cottage,wine.
